author: Staff Reporter
text:
Investors should come to mutual funds only with a long term plan, said S. Haresh, Regional Head- Retail, sales and distribution, ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund here on Friday.

Addressing an investor education camp organised jointly by The Hindu Business Line and ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund, Mr. Haresh said investors need to have a five to 10 year plan when it comes to investment in equities and mutual funds.

Clubbing of Mutual Funds with goal planning will offer a solution in the long term, he added.
title: ‘Investors in MF should have long-term plan’
